opening_data.job_requirements:
4+ years experience in Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), Oracle Process Cloud Service (PCS), Oracle Integration Cloud Service (ICS).
Overall technology experience - 6+ years.
Experience in Web Services (SOAP & REST using XML/JSON Payloads).
Understanding of Inherent tools and technologies of SaaS Applications (FBDI, BIP, ADFDI, Services in OER, Applications Composer, BIP, etc.).
Hands-On Experience of XSLT.
Hands-On Experience in data migration/integration methods i.e., SOAP and Rest Web Services, FBDI, and ADF DI.
Hands-On Experience with reporting tools such as OTBI, and BI Publisher.
Hands-On development of packages and functions using SQL/PLSQL and exposing them as REST using ORDS.
Hands-on with development and unit testing of integration components and web services (SOAP/REST) using OIC.
Hands-on with development and unit testing of VBCS components using OIC.
Strong knowledge of Oracle development tools, some e-Business application functionality, system administration, database structure, online patching, and knowledge of multi-Org architecture.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Design and develop integrations in OIC to Oracle SaaS Cloud including making REST and SOAP calls, FBDI File Uploads.
Design and develop customizations using Visual Builder and Process Builder in OIC to Oracle OPERA Cloud and ERP Cloud.
Support various Integration Interfaces in Oracle Cloud linking vital Business Critical Systems – Oracle and other systems – monitoring for issues and resolving them to maintain stability in the customers' business.
Design and develop Oracle OPERA, ERP Cloud modules.
Hands-on development support for implemented customizations using Visual Builder and Process Builder in OIC to Oracle OPERA Cloud.
Complete development tasks based on requirements submitted by business partners and best practices.
Develop additional various Integration Interfaces in Oracle Cloud to deliver high availability, rapidly developed, fully automated solutions.
Design and develop integrations in OIC to legacy systems.
opening_data.skill_set: Oracle Integration Cloud, Oracle Process Cloud Service, Oracle Integration Cloud Service, Web Services, SOAP, REST, SaaS Applications

opening_data.job_requirements:
5 years of experience as a DevOps Engineer.
Proficiency in system automation, deployment, and monitoring tools.
Experience with Linux, Jenkins, and scripting languages like Python and Shell.
Knowledge of CI systems and distributed data systems.
Strong IaC expertise with CDK, CloudFormation, or Terraform.
Hands-on experience in designing and running large-scale cloud networking.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Lead and guide DevOps activities to support client projects.
Design and integrate NearTekPod Cloud Platform and core services.
Develop automated CI/CD processes and ensure adherence to security standards.
Architect enterprise-scale cloud environments and ensure scalability and security.

opening_data.job_requirements:
8+ years of development experience in full stack technologies.
Proficient in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Sass.
Experience with Java, .Net, PHP, Typescript.
Familiar with modern JS and CSS frameworks like ES6, Sass, Node, NPM, Webpack, Babel, and Flexbox.
Experience with JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, Vue.
Experience with server-side technologies like Apache, Nginx, IIS, Node.js, and J2EE.
Strong knowledge of databases like MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Firestore.
Knowledge of versioning tools like Git, Mercurial, Bitbucket.
Excellent communication skills.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Design and develop full stack applications.
Work with front-end and back-end technologies.
Build applications for web, mobile web, and native mobile platforms.
Design and develop APIs.
Utilize cloud messaging APIs and push notifications.
opening_data.skill_set: Full Stack Technologies, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Sass, Java, .Net, PHP, Typescript, React, Angular, Vue, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Firestore, Git, Mercurial, Bitbucket, API Design, Cloud Messaging APIs

opening_data.job_requirements:
Strong understanding of mobile and web technologies.
Proficient in using testing tools and frameworks like Selenium, Appium, JIRA.
Ability to develop comprehensive test plans and execute test cases.
Excellent problem-solving skills.
Attention to detail and strong communication skills.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Develop and implement comprehensive test plans for mobile and web applications.
Execute test cases, analyze results, and report defects.
Perform regression testing and collaborate with development teams to ensure quality.
opening_data.skill_set: Mobile and Web Technologies, Testing Tools (Selenium, Appium, JIRA), Test Planning and Execution, Troubleshooting, Attention to Detail, Communication

opening_data.job_requirements:
Bachelor's degree in business or related field; or five to seven years related experience in a Salesforce Marketing Cloud environment.
Well-versed in Salesforce Marketing Cloud – Email Studio, Automation Studios, Journey Builder and hands-on experience in SQL and AMPscript.
Good understanding and experience on the data architecture/schema and data flows.
Global and large-scale Marketing Automation projects with strong practical development knowledge of Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Marketing Cloud Integrations (MC Connector), Integration Design, Data Modelling, AMPScript, SQL, and Data Mapping.
Proximity to script languages, databases, SQL, interfaces, and web development.
Conceptual knowledge of Marketing automation and Campaign Design, Identify resolution, Customer Intent funnel, Programmatic and Predictive Personalization.
Experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud administration.
Experience in troubleshooting skills with the ability to analyze and resolve difficult problems quickly.
Ability to gather requirements, design and deliver solutions on the Salesforce Marketing Cloud that meet client business goals and technical requirements.
Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to conceptualize and communicate highly detailed technical concepts to technical and non-technical audiences.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Act as a consultant and technical expert on the Salesforce Marketing Cloud to serve clients' needs.
Demonstrate technical expertise while scoping and driving the creation of digital solutions, email campaigns, email reporting, and data integration.
Gather business, marketing, and technical requirements in order to craft a comprehensive and scalable solution.
Architect data feeds, platform configuration, and components needed to run complex automated email campaigns.
Build, test, implement, and improve customer journeys and marketing campaigns.
Work with the customer data to create segments and data models that meet client requirements.
Create content personalization using simple scripting language (AMPscript).
Automate processes within the Salesforce Marketing Cloud.
Proactively identify and resolve problems including client data feed issues.
Create and deliver training to the wider team on SFMC functionality.
Stay abreast of industry technology innovations, new business practices, and third-party technology solutions.
Manage relationships with stakeholders, conduct workshops, coordinate marketing needs and requirements with project partners.
Help us continuously improve by identifying, creating, and enhancing internal systems and processes based on recurring client requests or evolving industry standards.
opening_data.skill_set: Salesforce Marketing Cloud, SQL, AMPscript, Data Modelling, Integration Design
opening_data.job_location: Chennai, India or Trichy, India or Remote

opening_data.job_requirements:
University students who graduated or are graduating from May 2023 to May 2024 with an MBA degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, Economics, or related field.
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to create effective presentations for senior management.
Ability to work both independently and in large, cross-functional team settings.
Microsoft Excel proficiency.
3-5 years minimum corporate work experience a plus.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Contribute hands-on alongside Finance & Accounting teams.
Participate in the MBA Finance & Accounting Rotation Program to work in different capacities across various functions before dedicating to one role.
Learn more about different areas of the organization and rapidly grow professional skills within NearTekPod.
Engage in the LAUNCH Program for corporate insights and company culture.
Navigate through starting and launching your career towards long-term aspirations.
Participate in training opportunities, professional insights, networking activities, and Equity, Inclusion & Diversity events.
opening_data.skill_set: Business Finance, FP&A, Operations Finance, Treasury, Accounting

1015 years of WordPress development experience

Experience with frontend frameworks and version control systems
Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or similar.
5 years of experience in Software Development Life Cycle using Agile methodology.
Analytical mindset and strong problemsolving skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication.
Good organizational skills and ability to work as part of a team.

Proficient with Java 8, Spring BootMVC, and REST APIs.
Experience with RDBMS schemas and queries.
Familiarity with Jenkins, JUnit, Mockito Framework, and version control applications.
Understanding of Design Patterns and best practices in Java.

Analyze user requirements to inform application design.

Develop and test software, Debug and resolve technical problems.
